statements: SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT job_title, ethnicity FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics ORDER BY hiring_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, job_title, gender FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE termination_date IS NULL;
SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY hiring_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) as total_hires FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY job_title ORDER BY total_hires DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, COUNT(DISTINCT ethnicity) as unique_ethnicities FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT job_title, AVG(DATEDIFF( termination_date, hiring_date)) as avg_tenure FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY job_title HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF( termination_date, hiring_date)) > 365;
SELECT report_date, COUNT(*) as total_reports FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY report_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics;
SELECT report_name, total_applicants FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE report_date = '2022-02-01';
SELECT report_name, diversity_applicants FROM diversity_hiring_statistics ORDER BY diversity_applicants DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE total_applicants > 100;
SELECT * FROM hiring_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE total_applicants > 100 AND diversity_applicants < 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, total_applicants FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE diversity_applicants >= 20 AND report_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT AVG(total_applicants) AS avg_total_applicants, AVG(diversity_applicants) AS avg_diversity_applicants FROM diversity_hiring_statistics
SELECT report_name, trend_description FROM diversity_hiring_statistics, hiring_trends WHERE diversity_applicants > 10 AND trend_category = 'Technology' AND trend_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_id, report_name, total_applicants FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics;
SELECT department_name, total_employees, minority_employees FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE gender_diversity_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT job_title, gender_diversity_ratio FROM diversity_hiring_statistics ORDER BY gender_diversity_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_demerographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE impact_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM diversity_hiring_statistics;
SELECT department_name, job_title, total_employees FROM diversity_hiring_statistics ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT job_title, MIN(total_employees) AS min_employees, MAX(total_employees) AS max_employees FROM diversity_hiring_statistics GROUP BY job_title;
SELECT department_name, minority_employees, gender_diversity_ratio FROM diversity_hiring_statistics WHERE minority_employees > 10;
SELECT * FROM employee_demerographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_stats;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_applicants FROM diversity_stats WHERE diverse_applicants > 10;
SELECT * FROM hiring_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_diversity WHERE diversity_category = 'Gender';
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM diversity_programs WHERE LENGTH(program_name) > 20;
SELECT * FROM diversity_stats;
SELECT report_date, total_applicants, diverse_applicants FROM diversity_stats WHERE hired_diverse_applicants > 10;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM hiring_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, diversity_category FROM employee_diversity WHERE diversity_category = 'Gender';
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM diversity_programs WHERE LENGTH(program_name) > 10 ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics;
SELECT job_title, department FROM diversity_metrics WHERE applicants_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM diversity_training ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT training_type, COUNT(*) as training_count FROM diversity_training GROUP BY training_type;
SELECT employee_id, survey_date, survey_question, survey_response FROM diversity_survey WHERE survey_response = 'Agree';
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE department = 'Human Resources';
SELECT job_title, diversity_category, applicants_count FROM diversity_metrics WHERE hires_count > 100 ORDER BY hires_count DESC;
SELECT department, job_title, diversity_category FROM diversity_metrics WHERE applicants_count < 50 AND hires_count < 20 OR diversity_category = 'Gender' ORDER BY job_title ASC, department DESC;
SELECT id, gender, ethnicity, age FROM employee_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY age ASC, ethnicity DESC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_reports WHERE report_type = 'Annual' AND report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
